import{createReducer}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={isLoading:true};export var orderReducer=createReducer(initialState,{// get all orders of user
getAllOrdersUserRequest:function getAllOrdersUserRequest(state){state.isLoading=false;},getAllOrdersUserSuccess:function getAllOrdersUserSuccess(state,action){state.isLoading=false;state.orders=action.payload;},getAllOrdersUserFailed:function getAllOrdersUserFailed(state,action){state.isLoading=false;state.error=action.payload;},// get all orders of shop
getAllOrdersShopRequest:function getAllOrdersShopRequest(state){state.isLoading=true;},getAllOrdersShopSuccess:function getAllOrdersShopSuccess(state,action){state.isLoading=false;state.orders=action.payload;},getAllOrdersShopFailed:function getAllOrdersShopFailed(state,action){state.isLoading=false;state.error=action.payload;},// get all orders for admin
adminAllOrdersRequest:function adminAllOrdersRequest(state){state.adminOrderLoading=true;},adminAllOrdersSuccess:function adminAllOrdersSuccess(state,action){state.adminOrderLoading=false;state.adminOrders=action.payload;},adminAllOrdersFailed:function adminAllOrdersFailed(state,action){state.adminOrderLoading=false;state.error=action.payload;},clearErrors:function clearErrors(state){state.error=null;}});
